Mamá o Papá

  • Set Decorator
  • Films

Florencia and Vicente, who have always done anything to succeed in their jobs while being the best parents, have decided to have the perfect divorce. Upon receiving a great job offer, Florencia and Vicente must decide who will keep the children. Both are willing to do anything to avoid getting custody of their kids.

  • Producer:Alebrije Producciones.
  • Client: Videocine
